issue.title: [Java] Jdbc converter support Null type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6850](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6850). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
java.sql.Types.Null is not supported yet since we have no NullVector in Java code before.

This could be implemented after ARROW-1638 merged (IPC roundtrip for null type).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6850?focusedCommentId=16953434) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5629
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5629>
